*Addressing at your fingertips*

Use the hii chrome desktop extension to copy your U.S. shipping address in real-time, from your favourite online stores.

How to use:

*Unlock your U.S. address*

Register for your free hii membership and unlock your U.S. shipping address.


*Shop from U.S. websites*

Enjoy sales tax-free shopping from top online U.S. brands and webstores.


*Home sweet home*

Powered by Fetchr, your international shopping delivered to your doorstep.
